reason: The 'keepUnoptimizedFilesPostProcessor' configuration option directly influences the handling of files during the post-processing phase of the dconverter software. If this option is enabled, the system retains unoptimized files, which can lead to increased disk space usage and potentially affect I/O performance. Additionally, retaining these files may result in longer execution times during subsequent processing tasks, as the system may need to manage and access a larger volume of data. Therefore, changes to this configuration can significantly impact both memory consumption and execution time, classifying it as performance-sensitive.
